name: Gentille Alouette -dirty demo
description:
Alouette lived his comfy egg home, never wanting to interact with the outside world, until one day the song is stolen out of his beloved music box and he was forced from his isolated life to retrieve it. But something seems wrong with this world, and he will soon find what his place isn't what it was meant to be. He will make strange friends like the absent minded Espoir and enigmatic enemies like the reality warping ROSE WITCH.
This is a very simple mostly hand drawn game with mild puzzles and quirky characters.
There will be some mini games inspired by Final fantasy and Undertale.
There will be some horror elements reminiscent of ""horror"" rpg maker games such as OFF and .FLOW.
As of now this is a short FREE (DIIIIRTY) DEMO, I intend to make it a commercial game when I finish it.
